plugin._field_explanation: Occlusion factor affects overall lens flare brightness and can also affect scale. Occlusion never affects rotation.

_field_long_integer.name: occlusion reflection index#occlusion information will be generated against the size of this reflection

_field_real.name: occlusion offset distance:world units#distance along offset direction used to test occlusion
occlusion inner radius scale#percent of the corona to occlude against (ie 0.25, 0.125, etc)
near fade begin distance:world units#distance where the lens flare starts to fade in
near fade end distance:world units#distance where the lens flare is fully faded in
far fade begin distance{near fade distance}:world units#distance at which the lens flare brightness is maximum
far fade end distance{far fade distance}:world units#distance at which the lens flare brightness is minimum; set to zero to disable distance fading

item.Name: rotate occlusion testing box with lens flare#otherwise remains aligned with screen. turn on render_debug_lens_flares and look at green box
no reflection opacity feedback#unchecked, each reflection evaluates its opacity from the previous reflection in the list
don't autofade#otherwise fade based on effect time, for effect attachments only
use separate X and Y falloff angles

plugin._field_explanation: Only affects lens flares created by effects.

_field_block_64.name: reflections

item.Name: only move along Y{lock to flare X}
only move along X{lock to flare Y}
proximity to center as function input#The input to the curves below should be multiplied by 1 if at the center of the screen and 0 if at the edge
mirror across flare#Also renders this reflection's mirror image across the flare center
draw in world space instead of screen space
use separate X and Y falloff angles

_field_real.name: near fade begin distance:world units#distance where the lens flare starts to fade in
near fade end distance:world units#distance where the lens flare is fully faded in
far fade begin distance:world units#distance at which the lens flare brightness is maximum
far fade end distance:world units#distance at which the lens flare brightness is minimum; set to zero to disable distance fading
axis offset:percent#percent offset in screen space along corona axis - 0.0 is on the corona, 1.0 is primary side edge of the screen, -1.0 is opposite side

_field_real_bounds.name: offset bounds#the axis offset times corona offset is clamped between these values

_field_struct.name: scale curve X#interpolated by external input
scale curve Y#interpolated by external input

_field_block_64._field_explanation: Tinting and modulating are not the same; 'tinting' a reflection will color the darker regions but leave the highlights, while 'modulating' will color everything uniformly. The modulation factor controls how much the reflection is modulated as opposed to tinted (0 is tinted, 1 is modulated). The tint power affects the curve of how much of the color range to tint.
